amendment.description: To strike the option to provide coverage to legal immigrants and increase the enrollment of uninsured low income American children.
amendment.purpose: To strike the option to provide coverage to legal immigrants and increase the enrollment of uninsured low income American children.

action.text: Amendment SA 41 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 39.
Amendment SA 41 modified to reflect a first degree status by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 41 proposed by Senator Grassley.

vote.text: Amendment SA 41 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
